alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 31 at 12:11AM PST until February 01 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A HIGH WIND WARNING IS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM PST THIS MORNING UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sustained south winds 30 to 40 mph, with gusts near 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Frazier Mountain Communities, Grapevine, and Tehachapi. * WHEN...From 9 AM PST this morning until 4 AM PST Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging wind gusts could blow down trees branches and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Secure outdoor items, such as patio furniture, sports equipment, and trash cans prior to the onset of high winds. Even the most common objects become dangerous projectiles when picked up and carried by high winds.
